title: The Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/23/22
itunes:title: The Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/23/22
description:
George Noory and author Nanci Danison explore the lessons she learned from having multiple near death experiences, how souls can decide when they want to leave the physical body, and how everything she had believed about life, death and God was wrong.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
